shortDescription: And now ladies and gents, we're about to watch the final of the Hardcore games and the skirts have never been higher. J'oral is torn, undecided between these heroes that are about to embody in the arena the current Aurigan civil war, with Ostergaard's new Annihilator making him everyone's favorite. What will happen? Who can tell J'oral or anyone else watching this broadcast?
longDescription: Kamea's appeal of the Concordat's gift of the 'Annie' to Ostergaard was dismissed despite the clear attempt to manipulate the results. There's nothing else we can do but watch.

dialogueContent.words: And the grand finale of the Hardcore games begins!
Kamea Arano faces Elias Ostergaard in a titanic duel.
Good luck MechWarriors, let the fun begin!
Captain Arano's 'Mech seems to have been disabled and all communications are down... let's hope the best for her.
Ostergaard wins, as predicted. J'oral is bored with these games.
INCOMING TRANSMISSION.
Arano, this is over. Surrender now and I'll let you live. Your 'Mech doesn't have a chance against mine.
I once heard those words from a greater MechWarrior than you, Ostergaard.
A lot of people in the Concordat want to see you dead. Including my father, who sees you as a terrorist for your attack on Perdition.
And I can kill you with a single volley, so power down your 'Mech and concede. You'll still walk out of this with your life.
That MechWarrior who failed was the now dead Gray Noton.
The Gray Noton???????
As you know, he's now dead. As will be anyone who stands in my way.
Tell that to your father if you survive. Prepare yourself for battle.
You're not invulnerable, Ostergaard. Your father should have taught you that.
Your talk won't change the inevitable outcome Arano.
Arrogance is a poor substitute for skill, Ostergaard.
Oh la la la! How a miss now???
My father ordered me not to let you walk out of this arena alive. So shall it be.
No, no, no, no... the Annie is getting ready to alpha strike!
What is she doing? J'oral can't see this anymore.
OH!
For the Concordat!
FOR JUSTICE! FOR THE RESTORATION!
The dark horse keeps riding! Go Kamea!
Your plot to kill me has failed. This is over.
You'll still die by his hands.
It's over, Ostergaard.
You think this will bring you back your throne? <cough> My father will torch the Reach until he finds and kills you.
Then he shall also face the sword of Restoration, as you have now!
J'oral is overwhelmed to announce that the winner of the 3028 Hardcore games is the dark horse that entered the competition, Lady Kamea Arano of the Aurigan Restoration!
